article_title: In Congress, expect renewed battles on refugees, guns, health care
article_text:
The House of Representatives is scheduled to vote on repealing health care law this week

Republican lawmakers continue to seek ways to limit Syrian refugee resettlement in U.S.

Obama, congressional Republicans and Democrats want to revamp criminal justice system. But will they?

article_metadata.title: In Congress, expect renewed battles on refugees, guns, health care | McClatchy DC

og.description: Congress returned Tuesday to deal with some unfinished business from 2015 and to forge a legislative agenda that could shape the 2016 presidential and congressional elections.
